name: ClientPlayerNetworkEvent.LoggingOut
description: Fired when the client player logs out. This event may also fire when a new integrated server is being created. This event is not invalid reference cancellable , and does not invalid reference have a result . This event is fired on the main Forge event bus , only on the logical client.

methods.name: getMultiPlayerGameMode
methods.description: Returns the multiplayer game mode controller for the player, may be null .. This may be null in certain situations such as the creating a new integrated server (singleplayer world) or connecting to a multiplayer server.

methods.name: getPlayer
methods.description: Returns the player instance, may be null .. This may be null in certain situations such as the creating a new integrated server (singleplayer world) or connecting to a multiplayer server.

methods.name: getConnection
methods.description: Returns the network connection for the player, may be null .. This may be null in certain situations such as the creating a new integrated server (singleplayer world) or connecting to a multiplayer server.
